Package org.js4ms.channels

Provides interfaces and classes for sending, receiving and transforming messages within an application.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DuplexChannel<MessageType> Interface exposed by all duplex message channel objects.
InputChannel<MessageType> Interface exposed by all message input channel objects.
MessageFilter<MessageType> Interface exposed by objects used to filter messages based on some form of selection criteria.
MessageInput<MessageType> Interface exposed by objects that can be used to receive a message from a message source.
MessageKeyExtractor<MessageType> Interface exposed by objects that extract a key value from a message.
MessageOutput<MessageType> Interface exposed by objects that may be used to send a message to a message sink.
MessagePipe<MessageType> Interface exposed by objects that accept messages from a message sender source and make those messages available to a message receiver.
MessageTransform<InputMessageType,OutputMessageType> Interface exposed by objects that transform or modify messages.
OutputChannel<MessageType> Interface exposed by all message output channels objects.
 

Class Summary
ChannelPump<MessageType> A message pump uses an internal thread to continuously receive messages from an InputChannel and send those messages to an OutputChannel.
InputChannelAdapter<InnerMessageType,OuterMessageType> Abstract base class for all message input channels that transform or filter messages received from an inner message channel.
InputChannelFilter<MessageType> An input channel adapter that uses a filter to determine which messages received from an inner input channel can be received from the adapter channel.
InputChannelPipe<MessageType> A message input channel that receives messages from any object that implements the MessageInput interface.
InputChannelTransform<InnerMessageType,OuterMessageType> An input channel adapter that transforms message objects received from another InputChannel into message objects of the same or different type.
MessageOutputMap<MessageType> An message channel that routes an incoming message to one in a set of message channels.
MessageQueue<MessageType> A message pipe that buffers messages in a fixed-size, blocking queue.
MessageSource<Message> An abstract message source that sends a stream of messages to an OutputChannel.
OutputChannelAdapter<OuterMessageType,InnerMessageType> Abstract base class for all message output channels that transform or filter messages before sending them to an inner message channel.
OutputChannelFilter<MessageType> An output channel adapter that uses a filter to determine which messages sent to the adapter channel should be sent to the inner output channel.
OutputChannelMap<MessageType> An output channel that forwards a message to one output channel out of a set of one or more output channels based on a key value extracted from the message.
OutputChannelPipe<MessageType> A message output channel that sends messages to any object that implements the MessageOutput interface.
OutputChannelTee<MessageType> An output channel that forwards messages to one or more attached output channels.
OutputChannelTransform<OuterMessageType,InnerMessageType> An output channel adapter that transforms message objects sent to it into message objects of the same or different type that it then forwards to another OutputChannel.
 

Package org.js4ms.channels Description

Provides interfaces and classes for sending, receiving and transforming messages within an application.
